titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Claim Sharks Effective Warnings Act of 2025
Department of Veterans Affairs Claim Sharks Effective Warnings Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to improve warnings about potential predatory practices regarding individuals acting as agents or attorneys in the preparation, presentation, or prosecution of veterans claims, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
